page.title: 03HEALTH CENTRE
page.content: The{Health Centre}is owned by the Area Health Authority.The Doctors rent half of the centre from the Health Authority and employ their own staff. There are 7 full-time doctors,1 part- time doctor and 1 trainee doctor and 23 other members of staff.They have 1 treatment room for nurses and 13 examination/consulting rooms for doctors.The Centre was built in 1976 to accommodate extra doctors owing to the rapid expansion of the Deepings and surrounding villages.Approximately 100 prescritions are written each day,the most popular medicines probably being pain killers. Groups that use the Centre include parents,relaxation classes and baby clinics. The most common illness for older poeple is arthritis and for young people respiratory infections.It takes in 16,000 patients.
